author: Ted Miller
comment: Ambient mode is a stroke of brilliance. Any chance of somehow displaying moonrise and moonset time?
title: Everything it promises

author: Christian Schaer
comment: A good start. The idea is great and the background looks great. The actual watch design could be nicer. And I would like to see a digital version.

reply.author: STETTINER
reply.content:
Digital time is available in PRO version.
Please download, try it and if you don't like it, you can refund the cost within few hours from the purchase :) 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eu.stettiner.moonphaseprowatchface
